data.title: Movies starring Debbie Reynolds
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies starring 'Debbie Reynolds', including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:
Singin' in the Rain

Singin' in the Rain is considered by many people to be among the best Hollywood musicals of all time. For those who have seen the movie, the reason for this is not difficult to understand. Watching Singin' in the Rain is an exuberant, magical exp...

That's Entertainment

Released in 1974 to celebrate MGM’s 50th anniversary, That’s Entertainment is a clip-show motion picture designed to highlight many of the studio’s beloved musicals. More than 50 songs are featured from movies as old as 1929 (The Hollywo...
